MathExpression.Script: choose('Brake Pressure Rear' [psi] <= 50 OR ( abs('Wheel Speed Rear Left' [in/s] - 'Wheel Speed Rear Right' [in/s]) / ( 75 * 0.10472 ) ) <= 10, abs('Wheel Speed Rear Left' [in/s] - 'Wheel Speed Rear Right' [in/s]) / 'Tire Radius' [in], invalid())

( ( ( 'Wheel Speed Rear Drive' [m/s] * 'Instantanius Corner Radius' [m] ) / ( 'Instantanius Corner Radius' [m] + ( 'Rear track' [m] / 2 ) ) ) - ( ( 'Wheel Speed Rear Drive' [m/s] * 'Instantanius Corner Radius' [m] ) / ( 'Instantanius Corner Radius' [m] - ( 'Rear track' [m] / 2 ) ) ) ) / 'Tire Radius' [m]
( 'Wheel Speed Rear Left' [m/s] - 'Wheel Speed Rear Right' [m/s] ) * - 1

choose(( 'Corr Speed' [km/h] > 10 AND abs('Vehicle Acceleration Lateral' [G]) > .1 AND 'Coasting' == 1 ), ( 'Vehicle Acceleration Lateral' [m/s/s] / 'Corr Speed' [m/s] * 'Rear track' [m] ), invalid())
( .5 * ( 'Wheel Speed Rear Left' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Rear Right' [km/h] ) - 'Corr Speed' [km/h] ) / ( .5 * ( 'Wheel Speed Rear Left' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Rear Right' [km/h] ) )
'Orion BMS 2 Pack Info Pack Inst Voltage' [V] * 'Orion BMS 2 Pack Info Pack Current' [A]
( 'CG Height' [mm] / 'Wheelbase' [mm] * 'Vehicle Mass' [kg] * 'Longitudnal accelration smoothed' [m/s/s] ) + ( 'Vehicle Mass' [kg] * ( 100 - 'Front Weight Bias ' [%] ) )
'Motor Controller Fast Info DC Bus Voltage' [V] * 'Motor Controller Current DC Bus Current' [A]
